# Trip Planner - Project Setup Instructions

## Project Overview
Full-stack Trip Planning application with:
- **Frontend**: Latest React with TypeScript and Vite
- **Backend**: .Net (ASP.NET Core)

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for type safety across the stack
- Follow RESTful API design patterns for backend
- Component-based architecture for frontend
- Responsive design for all UI components

## Getting Started
See README.md for installation and running instructions.
